Nalamālika Therī：An arahant．Ninety four kappas ago she was a kinnarā on the banks of the Candabhāgā，and，having seen the Buddha，offered him a garland of flowers．

She was queen of the devas thirty six times and queen among men in ten lives （Ap．ii．528f）．

She is probably identical with Cittā Therī （ThigA．33f）．
